caption: Table 1: PSNR(dB)/SSIM performance comparison. For different clients, we sample non-overlapping masks from the same mask distribution to train the model and use unseen masks randomly sampled from all clients for testing. We report mean±std among 100 trials for all methods.
description: This table compares the performance (PSNR and SSIM) of different federated learning methods (FedAvg, FedProx, SCAFFOLD, FedGST, and FedHP) for snapshot compressive imaging (SCI) reconstruction.  The experiments use different numbers of clients, all sampling non-overlapping masks from the same distribution for training, and then test on unseen masks randomly sampled from all clients. The results show the average PSNR and SSIM values across multiple trials, demonstrating the relative effectiveness of each method.

caption: Table 5: Performance comparison between FedAvg and FedHP on CACTI (e.g., C = 3).
description: This table presents a comparison of the performance of FedAvg and FedHP algorithms on the CACTI dataset with 3 clients.  It shows the average PSNR (Peak Signal-to-Noise Ratio) and SSIM (Structural Similarity Index) values along with their standard deviations. The results indicate a slight performance improvement of FedHP over FedAvg on this specific dataset.
